faq.answer: No, Clipdrop has limited Gratuit functionality and requires a subscription for full access. MyImageUpscaler offers 10 Gratuit Images monthly.

faq.question: Which is better for upscaling only?
faq.answer: MyImageUpscaler is better for upscaling-only needs with specialized Qualité tiers, face Amélioration, and text preservation. Clipdrop's Agrandisseur is one feature among many, making it less cost-effective if you only need upscaling.

faq.question: Does Clipdrop have face Amélioration?
faq.answer: Clipdrop has various IA Outils but doesn't offer the same specialized face Amélioration tiers as MyImageUpscaler (Face Restore with GFPGAN, Face Pro with Flux-2-Pro).

faq.question: When should I choose Clipdrop over MyImageUpscaler?
faq.answer: Choose Clipdrop if you need Plusieurs IA Outils in one platform (background removal, relighting, cleanup, etc.) alongside upscaling. For dedicated upscaling with better Qualité tiers and pricing, MyImageUpscaler is the superior choice.
